newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portuguese escudo steady against the mark.
newsitem.headline: Portuguese escudo steady against the mark.

text.p: The Portuguese escudo was trading steady against the mark on Wednesday, in line with other crosses against the German currency.
The escudo stood at 100.30/32 per mark, compared with 100.32/37 at Tuesday's European close.
Dealers said they expected it to trade in a narrow range between 100.25 and 100.35 on Wednesday.
